titleStmt.title: Camiltons discoverie of the devilish designes and killing projects of the Society of Jesuites of late years projected and by them hitherto acted in Germany : intended but graciously prevented in England / translated out of the Latine copie ... by W. F. X. B. ...
De studiis Jesuitarum abstrusioribus. English
titleStmt.author: Camilton, John.
W. F. X. B.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
